title: Ambesonne Multicolor Modern Men's Tie
features: Your purchase will help victims of recent major earthquakes in Turkey since we donate a percentage of our profits to local NGOs helping with quake relief efforts.
MEASUREMENTS - 3.7'' width at its broadest points. The length is 56" from the tip. Classic design.
MADE FROM - Silky feel %100 satin polyester. Gentle & breathable, high durability and wearability.
FEATURES - Machine washable. Can be used as dress tie for all formal and informal occasions.
FITS MOST ADULTS - Gift for husband, boyfriend, father, uncle and friends for all seasons.
PRINTED - With state of the art digital printing technology. Long-lasting bold colors & clear image.
description: MEASUREMENTS - 3.7'' width at its broadest points. The length is 59.2" from the tip. Classic design. MADE FROM - Silky feel %100 satin polyester. Gentle & breathable, high durability and wearability. FEATURES - Machine washable. Can be used as dress tie for all formal and informal occasions. FITS MOST ADULTS - Gift for husband, boyfriend, father, uncle and friends for all seasons. PRINTED - With state of the art digital printing technology. Long-lasting bold colors & clear image. Add more color and elegance to your formal looks with these unique ties for men. %100 silky feel breathable satin polyester fabric will ensure your comfort for all day or night long. Match your already- have tie pins with our various patterned cool ties. These ties are suitable for all formal and informal occasions. Create a formal look and feel the style and comfort at the same time during weddings, parties, banquets and more. Or you can choose a casual-formal look for everyday business. With durable and easy to care features, it'll be your essential piece for all for suit looks. Bring the novelty and modernity to your neckwear. Our ties are digitally printed with lastest technology. Also, it's a caring and helpful gift for your father, husband, boyfriend, uncle, grandfather and friends. With the contemporary and standard design, these ties fit most adults. The digital images we display have the most accurate color possible, however due to differences in computer monitors, we cannot be responsible for variations in color between the actual product and your screen. Due to manual measurement, please kindly allow 1-2 cm discrepancy.
